verses.verse: Now <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>purposed<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> counted <S%H5608>out<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to bear <S%H5449>burdens,<s%> and <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men who were stone <S%H2672>cutters<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> to oversee <S%H5329>them.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As you <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> him <S%H730>cedars<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> in which to <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> so deal with me.

<S%H1129>Behold,<s%> I am about to build a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> it to <S%H6999>him,<s%> and to burn <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H8548>spices,<s%> and for the continual show <S%H4635>bread,<s%> and for the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening,<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and on the new <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and on the set <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> This is an ordinance <S%H5769>forever<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"The <S%H1004>house<s%> which I <S%H1129>build<s%> is <S%H1419>great;<s%> for our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> above all <S%H430>gods.<s%>

But who is <S%H6113>able<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house,<s%> since <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3557>can't<s%> contain <S%H1129>him?<s%> who am I then, that I should build him a <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> just to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> before <S%H6440>him?<s%>

"Now therefore <S%H7971>send<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>skillful<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and in <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and in <S%H710>purple,<s%> and <S%H3758>crimson,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and who knows <S%H3045>how<s%> to <S%H6605>engrave<s%> <S%H2450>engravings,<s%> to be with the skillful men who are with me in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3559>provided.<s%>

<S%H7971>"Send<s%> me also <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> fir <S%H1265>trees,<s%> and algum <S%H418>trees,<s%> out of <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon:<s%> and <S%H5650>behold,<s%> my servants shall be with your <S%H5650>servants,<s%>

even to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance;<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I am about to <S%H1129>build<s%> shall be <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6381>wonderful.<s%>

<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will give to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> the <S%H2404>cutters<s%> who <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H4347>beaten<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>"

Then <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> in <S%H3791>writing,<s%> which he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> "Because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H160>loves<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> he has <S%H5414>made<s%> you king over <S%H4428>them.<s%>"

<S%H2361>Huram<s%> <S%H559>continued,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> who has <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3045>endowed<s%> with <S%H7922>discretion<s%> and <S%H2450>understanding,<s%> that should <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
Now I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3045>endowed<s%> with <S%H998>understanding,<s%> of <S%H2361>Huram<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>'s,

the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan;<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6876>Tyre,<s%> <S%H3045>skillful<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> in <S%H5178>brass,<s%> in <S%H1270>iron,<s%> in <S%H68>stone,<s%> and in <S%H6086>timber,<s%> in <S%H713>purple,<s%> in <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and in fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and in <S%H3758>crimson,<s%> also to <S%H6605>engrave<s%> any kind of <S%H6603>engraving,<s%> and to <S%H2803>devise<s%> any <S%H4284>device;<s%> that there may be a <S%H5414>place<s%> appointed to him with your skillful <S%H2450>men,<s%> and with the skillful <S%H2450>men<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

"Now therefore the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley,<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> which my <S%H113>lord<s%> has <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H7971>of,<s%> let him send to his <S%H5650>servants:<s%>

and we will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> out of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> as much as you shall <S%H6878>need;<s%> and we will <S%H935>bring<s%> it to you in <S%H7513>floats<s%> by <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa;<s%> and you shall carry it <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5608>numbered<s%> all the <S%H582>foreigners<s%> who were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5610>numbering<s%> with which <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H5608>numbered<s%> <S%H4672>them;<s%> and they were found one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

He <S%H6213>set<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of them to bear <S%H5449>burdens,<s%> and <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> who were stone <S%H2672>cutters<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5329>overseers<s%> to <S%H5647>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5647>work.<s%>
